resources.post:
This is one of the most RIDICULOUS stories ever heard.
Corona discharge, laser beams, and now nuclear explosion, what else will we hear about this piece of cloth and this resurrection bullcrap?
The tomb seal opened with a mini “nucelar blast” , what the heck are you guys smoking?
Time to go to bed, boys.
resources.title: The Shroud of Besancon holds the key to how the tomb was opened–Tin Foil Hat Warning
